title: Can we debuff wukong
body: I Just played a game where the adc, mid and me(jg) literally got one shot shot the build was storm razor,ie,duskblade,youmuus,edge of night and shiv  while the runes were dark harvest , sudden impact, eyeball and ultimate hunter with transcendence and gathering storm. try it out tell me what u think. i had 2000+ hp btw

replies.body:
you mean a champion that had 6 FULL ITEMS could 1-shot people... you dont say...

But seriously, anyone who has 6 full items is always going to pump out the damage. You can't really complain about that. Espeically when the people he "one shot" were a Lux/Kalista and Graves...

NOw if you said he one shot a 5000HP Mundo then there would be a problem.
